name: Armikrog.
blurb: A new adventure game made of clay. From the Neverhood creators - made possible because of YOU, our generous supporters.

rewards.reward: No Reward

ARMIKROG SUPPORTER (DIGITAL)\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nThank you! Your support helps get us closer to making ARMIKROG a reality! You'll receive a hi-rez digital download AMRIKROG desktop image painted by Earthworm Jim poster artist - Mike Koelsch!

THE ARIMKROG GAME - EARLY EXPLORER (DIGITAL)\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nA special price for you early supporters! You'll receive a DRM-free digital download of the ARMIKROG game for PC, MAC or LINUX (distributed though Steam and/or other comparable download venues). PLUS the hi-rez desktop image painted by Earthworm Jim poster artist - Mike Koelsch, and a THANK YOU for your support!

THE GAME (DIGITAL) - You'll receive a DRM-free digital download of the ARMIKROG game (distributed though Steam and/or other comparable download venues) for PC, MAC or LINUX. PLUS the hi-rez desktop image painted by Earthworm Jim poster artist - Mike Koelsch, and a THANK YOU for your support!

THE ART AND SOUNDS OF ARMIKROG (DIGITAL)\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll receive a 100 page digital download (PDF) of concept art used to create the ARMIKROG game and universe, PLUS a digital download sampler of 3 original songs from the ARMIKROG soundtrack, written and performed by TERRY S. TAYLOR. Terry was the composer of the original Neverhood soundtrack, so you know his music will inspire and amaze! PLUS all previous reward tiers!

ARMIKROG COMIC BOOK BY DOUG TENNAPEL + BEHIND THE SCENES MINI DOCUMENTARY (DIGITAL)\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll receive a digital download (PDF) of the 24 page, full color ARMIKROG comic book created for YOU, the supporters! PLUS a digital download of the "making-of" mini documentary (approx. 20 min. long). This includes interviews with the team, and an exclusive look at what it takes to create a clay and puppet animated game! PLUS all previous reward tiers!

FULL ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK (DIGITAL)\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll receive a digital download of the full original ARMIKROG soundtrack, written and performed by TERRY S. TAYLOR. PLUS all previous reward tiers!

ANIMATOR'S SCRAP HEAP + DELUXE DOCUMENTARY (DIGITAL)\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll receive a 50 page digital download (PDF) of animation sketches, notes,  exposure sheets, pencil test drawings, and other animation related artwork! PLUS a digital download of the deluxe "making-of" documentary (approx. 60 min. long). This includes additional behind the scenes footage, more interviews, and outtakes. PLUS all previous reward tiers!

DEVELOPERS COMMENTARY + DANCE MIXES (DIGITAL)\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll receive a digital download of game footage with audio commentary from Michael J. Nelson (Rifftrax / MST3K) and the ARMIKROG development team (approx. 60 min. long). PLUS exclusive dance mixes of songs from the ARMIKROG soundtrack!. PLUS all previous reward tiers!

ARMIKROG "ASTRONAUT HANDBOOK" + PRINTED AMRIKROG COMIC BOOK by Doug TenNapel (PHYSICAL)\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll receive a digital download of the 100 page written novel by The Neverhood's "Wall of Records" authors--Doug TenNapel and Mark Lorenzen! PLUS a PRINTED VERSION of the 24 page, ARMIKROG comic book. This LIMITED EDITION comic will ONLY be avalible for Kickstarter supporters. PLUS all previous reward tiers!

BOXED EDITION (PHYSICAL)\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nThis boxed version includes a DVD of the ARMIKROG game along with the printed manual. PLUS all previous reward tiers!. (Free shipping in the U.S. Please add $15 for international shipping).

BOXED EDITION COLLECTOR'S SET (PHYSICAL)\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nIncludes everything from the $75 tier, PLUS a DVD of the ARMIKROG game and printed manual, the BEHIND THE SCENES documentary on DVD, and a CD of the TERRY S.TAYLOR soundtrack, together in a boxed set. (Free shipping in the U.S. Please add $20 for international shipping).

TENNAPEL'S SKETCHBOOK ARCHIVES (PHYSICAL)\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nYou'll get a digital copy of the Armikrog game with this FINAL OFFERING of Doug TenNapel's "Sketchbook Archives" to the public! Comes signed, with a doodle of Beak-Beak inside. This is a stand alone tier, but you can still buff it out with Add-Ons. (Free shipping in the U.S. Please add $23 for Canada & Mexico, $33 for all other international orders).

YOU CREATE A NAME FOR AN ITEM + "GUARDIAN OF GOODS" GAME CREDIT + THE "ASTRONAUT HANDBOOK" (ALL DIGITAL) ------------------------------------------------- Includes everything from the $60 tier, PLUS you'll create a name for an ITEM that will be included in the Armikrog Histories within the game (subject to approval by Pencil Test Studios). Your item could be a weapon, tool, magical scroll, or a variety of other things! PLUS you'll receive your name listed in the game credits as a "Guardian of the Goods" noting the item you named. PLUS you'll receive a digital download of the "Astronaut Handbook," the 100 page written novel by The Neverhood's "Wall of Records" authors--Doug TenNapel and Mark Lorenzen!

BOXED EDITION COLLECTOR'S SET + KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE ARMIKROG T-SHIRT + YOUR NAME IN THE GAME CREDITS (PHYSICAL) \r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nIncludes everything from the $75 tier, PLUS a DVD of the ARMIKROG game and printed manual, the BEHIND THE SCENES documentary on DVD, and a CD of the TERRY S.TAYLOR soundtrack, together in a boxed set. PLUS you'll receive a T-shirt designed exclusively for Kickstarter supporters (please specify XXL, XL, L, M, or S). PLUS a special thanks in the game credits! (Free shipping in the U.S. Please add $20 for international shipping).

YOU CREATE A NAME FOR AN ASTRONAUT + "ARMIKROG ASTRONAUT" GAME CREDIT + THE "ASTRONAUT HANDBOOK" (ALL DIGITAL) ------------------------------------------------- Includes everything from the $60 tier, PLUS you'll create a name for an ASTRONAUT that will be listed in the Armikrog Histories within the game (subject to approval by Pencil Test Studios). PLUS you'll receive your name listed in the game credits as an "Armikrog Astronaut" noting the character you named. PLUS you'll receive a digital download of the "Astronaut Handbook," the 100 page written novel by The Neverhood's "Wall of Records" authors--Doug TenNapel and Mark Lorenzen!

ULTIMATE LIMITED EDITION BOXED COLLECTOR'S SET SIGNED (FOR BACKERS ONLY) +  KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE ARMIKROG T-SHIRT + "HONORARY DEVELOPMENT TEAM MEMBER" GAME CREDIT (PHYSICAL)\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nIncludes everything from the $75 tier, PLUS a signed and numbered LIMITED RUN, LIMITED EDITION boxed set of the GAME, BEHIND THE SCENES and SOUNDTRACK. This collectors edition has unique artwork and packaging (different than the BOXED EDITION COLLECTOR'S SET) and will ONLY be available to Kickstarter supporters. This set will not be available once the campaign has ended. PLUS you'll receive a T-shirt designed exclusively for Kickstarter supporters (please specify XXL, XL, L, M, or S). PLUS you'll have your name in the game credits as "Honorary Development Team Member"! (Free shipping in the U.S. Please add $20 for international shipping).

YOU CREATE THE BACKSTORY FOR A CHARACTER + "CURATOR OF HISTORIES" GAME CREDIT + THE "ASTRONAUT HANDBOOK" (ALL DIGITAL) ------------------------------------------------- Includes everything from the $60 tier, PLUS you'll write a backstory for a character (approx. 1 paragraph) that will be included in the Armikrog Histories within the game (subject to approval by Pencil Test Studios - edited by Doug TenNapel). We'll give you an image or a physical description of the character, and you create the backstory! PLUS you'll receive your name listed in the game credits as a "Curator of Histories" noting the character you've chronicled. PLUS you'll receive a digital download of the "Astronaut Handbook," the 100 page written novel by The Neverhood's "Wall of Records" authors--Doug TenNapel and Mark Lorenzen!

YOUR NAME IN A SONG BY TERRY S. TAYLOR (+ PHYSICAL)\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nIncludes everything from the $90 tier (PHYSICAL), PLUS your name will be sung in the \u201cName Song\u201d by Terry S. Taylor! For those who choose this tier, Terry will be composing and performing a song where he will include the names of all those who support this tier. Have your name be forever sung on the Armikrog soundtrack! You can use your own name (first and last), or the name of a loved one or friend. One full name per pledge.

BEAUTIFULLY PRINTED ARMIKROG "ASTRONAUT HANDBOOK" (PHYSICAL)\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nIncludes everything from the $350 tier, PLUS a LIMITED RUN beautifully printed and bound version of the 100 page written novel by The Neverhood's "Wall of Records" authors--Doug TenNapel and Mark Lorenzen. (Free shipping in the U.S. Please add $20 for international shipping).

ORIGINAL SIGNED PENCIL TEST DRAWING
(PHYSICAL)
-------------------------------------------------
Includes everything from the $500 tier, PLUS an original ARMIKROG pencil test drawing used in the production of the game. These hand drawn animation images are used to plan out how a character moves, acts or reacts. Each drawing is unique to a specific character and their movement. (Free shipping in the U.S. Please add $20 for international shipping).

YOUR NAME IN AN ARMIKROG PUZZLE\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nIncludes everything from the $650 tier, PLUS your name will be etched in eternity into the wall of a secret room dedicated only to those who support this tier.

ORIGINAL PRODUCTION SETPIECE USED IN THE ARMIKROG GAME\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nIncludes everything from the $650 tier, PLUS you'll receive a setpiece that was used in the production of the game. Own a physical piece of the ARMIKROG world!

LIMITED EDITION TOMMYNAUT & BEAK-BEAK SCULPTED STATUETTE (10" tall)\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nIncludes everything from the $650 tier, PLUS a LIMITED EDITION statuette sculpted by Disney character sculptor TONY CIPRIANO. This cast of Tommynaut (our Hero) and Beak-Beak (Tommynaut's trusted companion) is approx. 10 inches tall and is hand painted by the ARMIKROG production team.

YOU NAME A WORLD + DEVELOPERS SKYPE SESSION + "ADDITIONAL DESIGN" GAME CREDIT\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nIncludes everything from the $2500 tier, PLUS you'll have a 20 minute SKYPE session with Doug TenNapel, Mike Dietz and Ed Schofield where you pitch your name ideas for a world that will end up in the AMRIKROG universe. PLUS you'll receive "additional design" credit!

YOUR LIKENESS IN THE GAME + A SCULPTURE OF YOU + YOU NAME YOUR STATUE + \u201cADDITIONAL DESIGN\u201d GAME CREDIT ------------------------------------------------- Includes everything from the $2500 tier, PLUS your likeness will be caricatured, sculpted and featured as a statue in the \u201cExalted Heroes\u201d section of the Armikrog Histories. PLUS your name (or a name of your choice - subject to approval by Pencil Test Studios) will be featured on the base of the statue. PLUS you'll receive the actual statue of you used in the game (approx. 9 inches tall). PLUS you\u2019ll receive "additional design" credit!

BEAK-BEAK PRODUCTION PUPPET + "BEAK-BEAK WRANGLER" GAME CREDIT + A "CREW" T-SHIRT ------------------------------------------------- Includes everything from the $2500 tier, PLUS a Beak-Beak  production puppet used in the game -- suitable for display or animation! PLUS your name will be listed in the credits as "Beak-Beak Wrangler" PLUS an ARMIKROG "CREW" t-shirt!

ARMIKROG PRODUCTION PUPPET + A "CREW" T-SHIRT\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nIncludes everything from the $2500 tier, PLUS a Tommynaut foam latex production puppet used in the game -- suitable for display or animation! PLUS an ARMIKROG "CREW" t-shirt!

YOU ANIMATE ON THE GAME + STUDIO VISIT + A STOP MOTION ANIMATION LESSON + "ADDITIONAL ANIMATION" GAME CREDIT + A DELICIOUS MEAL + 10 SIGNED COPIES OF THE "ULTIMATE LIMITED EDITION BOXED COLLECTOR'S SET"\r\n-------------------------------------------------\r\nFor your generous pledge, we want to meet you in person! This reward includes everything from the $6,000 tier, PLUS come visit Pencil Test Studios for a day: You'll get a tutorial on stop-motion animation, and YOU will animate a sequence that will end up in the game, PLUS you'll receive "additional animation" credit, PLUS an ARMIKROG "CREW" t-shirt, PLUS we'll take you out for a delicious meal, PLUS you'll receive 10 additional copies of the "ULTIMATE LIMITED EDITION BOXED COLLECTOR'S SET" to give to your family and friends. Whew! (Travel and accommodations not included--must be able to travel to Lake Forest, CA).
